entry.title: Biden's Poland Visit to Spotlight Aid for Ukraine
entry.content: President Bidenâ€™s meeting with the Polish leader comes as more than two million Ukrainian refugees have crossed the border into the NATO country.

entry.title: Taliban Rules Impose Chaperones on Afghan Women
entry.content: Women in Afghanistan must now be accompanied by a male relative to complete many basic tasks, among a series of new measures they say threaten to squeeze them out of public and professional life.
